strategy_reasoning: Using a 'Garden Maintenance' RPG theme fits our nature-based brand identity while explaining technical updates (cleanup, bug fixes, tool restoration) in a cozy, gamified way. The pixel art style aligns with the requested nostalgic/Gen-Z aesthetic.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a cute 8-bit bee character holding a pixelated wrench, hovering over a digital garden. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Floating pixel text says 'PATCH NOTES'. Nostalgic, wholesome, welcoming.
images.description: Title card showing the bee character ready to work, setting the cozy maintenance vibe.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art of a magical open toolbox. Inside are glowing pixel icons: a magnifying glass and a code scroll (representing Gemini tools). Soft pastel mint and peach gradient background. Magical sparkles, warm lighting, cozy vibes. Text in pixel font: 'TOOLS RESTORED'. Lime green (#ecf874) glow effects.
images.description: Highlighting the fix for Gemini-fast tools (search and code execution) being back online.

images.prompt: Pixel art scene of a broom sweeping away small glitchy 'bug' sprites from a lime green (#ecf874) floor. Clean, minimalist 8-bit aesthetic like the game Unpacking. Soft warm lighting. Background is a gentle purple gradient. Text in pixel font: 'BUG SQUASHING'. Satisfying and tidy.
images.description: Visualizing the branch cleanup, Veo error fixes, and URL encoding fixes as 'tidying up'.

caption:

alt_text: A series of cozy pixel art images in lime green and pastel colors. 1. A cute pixel bee with a wrench in a garden. 2. A glowing toolbox with search and code icons. 3. A pixel broom sweeping away glitch bugs.
